name: Mix-n-Match Pass It On Plate - Original
description: A Pass It On Plate is a fun way to give away delicious food gifts. These plates travel from person to person and tell a story as they travel. Compared to gift cards, Pass It On Plates have way more heart and soul, but take you the same time and energy to give. Check out our FAQ to learn more about this item. This is a Mix-n-Match Pass It On Plate. Whew - long title, but that means you can create your own Pass It On Plate from absolutely ANYTHING you see in our shop. Choose your favorite PlateWrap, pick the best Pretty Little Doo Dad, and don't forget the pen! Tell us what you want when you place your order and we'll make one up just for you. Very cool. So what do I get with this? ♦ A sturdy, 11.5" ceramic dinner plate with its own unique registered number hand-written on it - you tell us which color you want ♦ Your favorite PlateWrap ♦ Any Pretty Little Doo Dad shown in any picture ♦ The special paint pen needed for writing your name on the plate - just tell us what color you want ♦ and simple instructions for the whole thing. To choose your plate color, your PlateWrap and a Pretty Little Doo Dad, just visit our photo gallery and let us know what you would like. Each picture names the various colors and fabrics to help you indicate your selection. If you have questions, please contact us (the link is in the sidebar) and we'll be happy to assist you. We have also listed a few of our most popular options here, and come with white plates and a paint pen that coordinates with the PlateWrap. Note: The lemon bread in the picture is used for display purposes only and is not included with your plate. Sorry. It does look good, doesn't it? Check our website at

options.name: Kitty Kitty Kitty Cat with pink fishy tie in
Rrrowf! with turquoise bone tie in
Yappy Dog with turquoise bone tie in
